actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend titles 10 and 37, United States Code, to provide career incentives for certain professionally trained officers of the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Allows, for the purposes of determining grade and position, up to three years credit to be given an Armed Forces officer if he is appointed in a specialty requiring training beyond the college level as a precondition to appointment, one year for each academic year so required.

titles.title: A bill to amend titles 10 and 37, United States Code, to provide career incentives for certain professionally trained officers of the Armed Forces.
